p: Changes in species richness, colonisation, disappearances and community‐weighted ecological indicators showed equal trends in dataset 1994–2004–2014 (involving three surveys with 355 plots, see below) and 1994–2014 (involving only the first and third surveys with 654 plots). Therefore, only the former is reported here (Figs 2, 3, 4, S3– S8; Tables S4– S22) and the latter is provided in Supporting Information (Tables S23– S30).
